title: Goswami whatsapp leaks prove Indian conspiracy behind Pulwama: Shehryar Afridi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 17 (APP):Chairman Kashmir Committee Shehryar Khan Afridi Sunday said that whatsapp leaks of an Indian journalist Arnab Goswami again proved that the Pulwama Attack was an inside job orchestrated by Indian intelligence to blame Pakistan and Kashmiri Freedom Fighters.
Again proved that #PulwamaAttack was an inside job orchestrated by Indian intelligence to blame #Pakistan & Kashmiri Freedom Fighters. #ArnabGate is second expose after EU Disinfo Lab which also exposed the filthy face of Indian intelligence to blame Pakistan. Modi regime exposed pic.twitter.com/fSL7LGogIV
— Shehryar Afridi (@ShehryarAfridi1) January 16, 2021
It was the second time when filthy face of Indian intelligence was exposed after EU Disinfo Lab report that resurrected dead media, dead think-tanks and NGOs working to target Pakistani and Kashmiris’ interests, he tweeted.
